00029 namespace trsl {
00030   
00032   namespace detail {
00033     
00034     template<typename T>
00035     class identity
00036     {
00037     public:
00038       T operator() (const T& t)
00039         {
00040           return t;
00041         }
00042     };
00043     
00044     template<typename RandomAccessIterator, typename RandomNumberGenerator>
00045     void partial_random_shuffle(RandomAccessIterator first,
00046                                 RandomAccessIterator middle,
00047                                 RandomAccessIterator last,
00048                                 RandomNumberGenerator &rg)
00049     {
00050       if (first == middle)
00051         return;
00052         
00053       for (RandomAccessIterator i = first; i != middle; ++i)
00054       {
00055         std::iter_swap(i, i + rg(last - i));
00056       }
00057     }
00058     
00059   }
00060   
00062   namespace rand_gen {
00063 
00068     inline unsigned int uniform_int(unsigned int n)
00069     {
00070 #ifdef TRSL_USE_BSD_BETTER_RANDOM_GENERATOR
00071       return ::random()%n;
00072 #else
00073       return std::rand()%n;
00074 #endif
00075     }
00076   
00081     template<typename Real>
00082     inline Real uniform_01()
00083     {
00084 #ifdef TRSL_USE_BSD_BETTER_RANDOM_GENERATOR
00085       return (::random() / (RAND_MAX+Real(1.0)));
00086 #else
00087       return (std::rand() / (RAND_MAX+Real(1.0)));
00088 #endif
00089     }
00090     
00091   }
00092 }

00094 #endif // include guard
